text: This is a list of movies made and released by Walt Disney Pictures. ==Released== ===1930s–1940s=== Release date Title Notes Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs first film to be distributed by RKO Radio Pictures Inducted into the National Film Registry in 1989 Pinocchio Inducted into the National Film Registry in 1994 Fantasia anthology film Inducted into the National Film Registry in 1990 The Reluctant Dragon fictionalized tour around the Disney studio Dumbo Inducted into the National Film Registry in 2017 Bambi Inducted into the National Film Registry in 2011 Saludos Amigos anthology film Victory Through Air Power documentary film with wide use of animation; distributed by United Artists The Three Caballeros anthology film Make Mine Music anthology film Song of the South Fun and Fancy Free anthology film Melody Time anthology film So Dear to My Heart The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad anthology film ===1950s=== Release date Title Notes Cinderella Inducted into the National Film Registry in 2018 Treasure Island produced by RKO-Walt Disney British Productions Alice in Wonderland The Story of Robin Hood produced by RKO-Walt Disney British Productions Peter Pan The Sword and the Rose produced by RKO-Walt Disney British Productions The Living Desert first film to be distributed by Buena Vista Pictures Distribution Rob Roy: The Highland Rogue produced by RKO-Walt Disney British Productions; last film to be distributed by RKO Radio Pictures The Vanishing Prairie 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier compilation film mostly made up from pre-existing footage from the Disney anthology television series Lady and the Tramp Inducted into the National Film Registry in 2023.
